=== (ongoing) ===


=== 0.2. ===

- fetching on times the date range before and after the defined period in the
  form to allow e.g. copying from this data in the form/js/management view
- corrected model validation and added list filter via type to admin
- Fixed extra on form to allow more than 2 value types displayed
- made superuser always allowed to open management views
- allowing hidden and non-editable fields

=== 0.1.1 ===

- Adding BetterTranslatedAttribute for hvad attributes

=== 0.1 ==
- Initial commit
